item.title: Police identify first four victims of Swiss ski resort fire
item.description: Bodies of two Swiss women aged 21 and 16, and two Swiss men aged 18 and 16 have been returned to their families.

item.title: More than 100 shelter overnight in Japan shrine due to heavy snow
item.description: Visitors of the Mitsumine Shrine spent the night there after roads around it were shut off.

item.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
item.description: Families are appealing for information about children as young as 15 who are thought to have been at the bar.

item.title: Two people killed in magnitude 6.5 earthquake in Mexico
item.description: The powerful earthquake shook southern and central Mexico on Friday, also leaving several people injured.

item.title: Trump warning over Iran protests 'reckless' says foreign minister
item.description: The US president earlier said if peaceful protesters are killed, Washington "will come to their rescue".
